revision.text:
{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Macally |model = iHub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = MHUB-01 |page_start_date = 05/06/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Macally iHub |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->
|usb_ver = 1.0 |conn = Female B |size_class = desktop
|vendor_id = 0451 |device_id = 1446 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number -->
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Texas Instruments;TUSB2040; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|ports = 4 |1394ports = |tt = |power_led = red + green (w/ plugged in device) |port_led = |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none -->
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 12/1998 |estprice = 79.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "BG-3701-05" is silkscreened on the board. :The hub is using a '''Weston''' B connector, 4 '''BGE''' branded A connectors, all '''ELGEN''' branded electrolytic capacitors, a [http://www.micrel.com/_PDF/mic29150.pdf '''Micrel''' 29302BT voltage regulator], and two [http://doc.chipfind.ru/pdf/micrel/mic25262bn.pdf '''Micrel''' MIC2526-2BN USB power control switches].
==Links of Interest== [http://web.archive.org/web/19981203033705/http://www.macally.com/specs/usbhubm.html Product page (via archive.org)] from 1998-12 :[http://web.archive.org/web/19981201205220/http://macally.com/ Main page from 1998-12]
[http://www.macobserver.com/newreviews/bt/99/991018ihub/ihub.html Review on '''the Mac Observer'''] (dated 1999-10-18)
[http://www.trademarkia.com/macally-ihub-75598182.html '''iHub''' copyright filing] dated 1998-12-02
